title: GET_ENTITY_HEADING_FROM_EULERS
content:
0x846BF6291198A71E0x9320E642// GetEntityHeadingFromEulers
float GET_ENTITY_HEADING_FROM_EULERS(Entity entity);Parameters:entity: The entity to get the heading from.Returns: Returns a float representing the entity's heading from eulers.Gets the heading of the entity physics in degrees, which tends to be more accurate than just GET_ENTITY_HEADING. This can be clearly seen while, for example, ragdolling a ped/player.Old name:  _GET_ENTITY_PHYSICS_HEADING
